ETYMOLOGY: From the noun 'part' combined with the adverbial suffix '-ly'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Adverb: modifies a verb, adjective, or other adverb
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To some extent; in part; not completely.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 部分地；在一定程度上；非全部地。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The success of the project was partly due to the timely intervention of the manager.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 该项目的成功部分归功于经理的及时干预。

REGISTER: General usage, common in all forms of speech and writing.
